alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Hooker; Thomas; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 24 at 7:39PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Cherry, northeastern Hooker and northwestern Thomas Counties through 830 PM CDT/730 PM MDT/... At 738 PM CDT/638 PM MDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles north of Mullen, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mullen, Seneca, Giant Hill, Norway and Kelso. This includes the following highways... Highway 2 between mile markers 186 and 206. Highway 97 between mile markers 68 and 81. Highway 83 between mile markers 158 and 164. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Cherry; Hooker; Thomas; Western Cherry
